page.title: 07GRAHAM HOUSE,DORNIE
page.content: Graham House is a modern purpose built home for the frail elderly.It can take up to 21 residents who come from all parts of Skye and Lochalsh.These residents are referred to the the home by their doctor.The residents are all old age pensoners but the amount they pay is governed by what their assets are.They all receive pocket money of Â£7.15 per week.The home provides for all the needs of the residents food, heating,lighting,laundry.Most have single rooms but there are 3 double rooms.There are 18 staff covering the 24 hours period.The residents can only bring personal belongings but they can include their pets.They miss their privacy but enjoy the constant warmth, regular food and companionship.The visitors are encouraged but there is not a great deal of contact with the community.
